channel.title: Posts on Jameson Watts, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jameson Watts, Ph.D.

item.title: A New Database for Context-Sensitive Semantic Relatedness
item.description: library(reticulate) use_python("/Applications/anaconda/bin/python", required = TRUE) OMG Python in RStudio! for i in range(10): if(i<5): print("Hello Little World "+str(i)) else: print("Hello Big World "+str(i)) ## Hello Little World 0 ## Hello Little World 1 ## Hello Little World 2 ## Hello Little World 3 ## Hello Little World 4 ## Hello Big World 5 ## Hello Big World 6 ## Hello Big World 7 ## Hello Big World 8 ## Hello Big World 9 Okay, moving on.

item.title: Craven Speed Clusters
item.description: library(reticulate) use_python("/Applications/anaconda/bin/python", required = TRUE) print("Hello World") ## Hello World import pandas as pd dfi = pd.read_csv('/Users/jwatts/Dropbox/website/private/ECommerce.csv') print(dfi.describe) ## <bound method NDFrame.describe of cid orders avg_order_size ... last_order recency longevity ## 0 142 85 602.441294 ... 8/20/18 2 336 ## 1 158 5 130.362000 ... 6/21/18 62 105 ## 2 297 2 206.105000 ... 8/21/18 1 286 ## 3 352 4 98.860000 ... 5/10/18 104 205 ## 4 417 2 37.
